definition: the five Liang of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Liang 前涼|前凉 (314-376), Later Liang 後涼|后凉 (386-403), Northern Liang 北涼|北凉 (398-439), Southern Liang 南涼|南凉 (397-414), Western Liang 西涼|西凉 (400-421)

sentences.english: He went outside the walls, sat under a shady plant and sulked.
sentences.chinese: 他走到围墙外面，站在一棵荫凉的植物下生气。

sentences.english: Shall we rest in the shade beneath these trees?
sentences.chinese: 我们在树下荫凉处休息一下好吗？

sentences.english: After he walked away, they have been busy finding new shade.
sentences.chinese: 在他走开之后，他们已经是忙于发现新荫凉处。

sentences.english: A teak deck for al fresco dining and a canopy for shade.
sentences.chinese: 一块吃饭用的麻栗树木材甲板和荫凉的一个天棚。

sentences.english: But you forget that the shadow allows the growth of the fungi.
sentences.chinese: 但是你忘记了荫凉会导致真菌的生长。

sentences.english: At that point Jrgensen and I paused in the shade of a cottonwood to rest.
sentences.chinese: 我和乔根森在那个地方停下来，在杨树的荫凉处休息。

sentences.english: The trees afford a pleasant shade.
sentences.chinese: 这些树为人们提供荫凉。

sentences.english: Leave those athletic wraparound shades for beach-volleyball players and center fielders.
sentences.chinese: 连沙滩排球手和中场手都可以享受运动包裹下的荫凉。

sentences.english: Curtis Swift says shade can help correct these problems.
sentences.chinese: 斯威夫特表示，荫凉可以帮助矫正这些问题。

sentences.english: Mr. Hoffman says plants with wider leaves seem to do better in shady environments.
sentences.chinese: 霍夫曼表示，宽叶植物在荫凉环境下似乎生长得更好。

sentences.english: o Stand in a shady area then close your eyes
sentences.chinese: 站在荫凉的区域内，然后闭上眼睛。

sentences.english: Put the cover of casing on the container, displace to the shade.
sentences.chinese: 将包装封面盖在容器上，移置荫凉处。

sentences.english: They bound an umbrella to a pole to get some shade.
sentences.chinese: 他们将伞绑在柱子上以得到一些荫凉。

sentences.english: Then we will fight in the shade.
sentences.chinese: 那我们就在荫凉处战斗。

definition: to cool off in the shade
to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
to give shade (of a tree etc)/to shield
verdant/lush green and full of life
